name: Paulo Miklos
description:
'''Paulo Roberto de Souza Miklos''' (known as '''Paulo Miklos''' {{IPA|pt|ˈpawlu ˈmiklus}}, born on January 21, 1959) is a Brazilian multi-instrumentalist, musician and actor. He is best known for his tenure with the band [[Titãs]], in which he was a vocalist, guitarist and occasional saxophonist, keyboardist and harmonica player from its inception in 1982 until 2016, when he left it to focus on personal projects.

As an actor, he has appeared in a few films and television series. His acting career started with a main role in the movie ''[[O Invasor]]''.
